Greenville.Pitt Community College: Pitt Community College, commonly known as PCC, is a two-year accredited institution of higher education and technical training school, and is located in Winterville, North Carolina in Pitt County. The school is part of the North Carolina Community College System, a state-supported body of 58 institutions throughout North Carolina. The school has an enrollment of over 9,000 undergraduate students with a total of 11,771 students enrolled in the Curriculum Program.
